LanguageData.SettingRegressionHealingHelp: Controls how fast regression severity heals naturally.
LanguageData.SettingBaseRecoveryHelp: Amount of severity healed per in-game day under neutral conditions.
LanguageData.SettingRestingMultiplierHelp: Multiplier to recovery while pawn is resting in bed.
LanguageData.SettingChildMultiplierHelp: Multiplier to recovery speed for non-adult pawns.
LanguageData.SettingAnimalMultiplierHelp: Animals have usually a shorter lifespawn and their lifecycle should be accelerated relative to humans.
LanguageData.SettingRessurectChanceHelp: The chance a pawn will be resurrected at a severity at between 149-150% regression. This will have a major impact on the amount of random ressurections if regression weapons are used to defend against raids.
LanguageData.SettingSkillMaskingHelp: Controls how strongly regression lowers visible skill levels.
LanguageData.SettingLevelMaskBySeverity: Percent of Levels masked at full severity
LanguageData.SettingLevelMaskBySeverityHelp: The percent of acquired skill levels that are unavailable while severity is at 100%.
LanguageData.SettingEnableTwoUpHelp: Render two rows side-by-side when there’s enough width.
LanguageData.SettingSnapToUiScaleHelp: Snap rectangles like vanilla Label() to avoid blurry text at fractional UI scales.
LanguageData.SettingTinyFontFallbackHelp: Allow switching the right label to Tiny font when it reduces height.
LanguageData.SettingEnableTwoColRightHelp: Split long right text into two narrow columns.
LanguageData.SettingMinTwoUpCellWidthHelp: Minimum width of each half-cell to attempt two-up.
LanguageData.SettingFullWidthHeightGateHelp: If a half-cell would be taller than this, render full width instead.
LanguageData.SettingTwoColTriggerHeightHelp: If the right text wraps taller than this, use two internal columns.
LanguageData.SettingTwoColMinWidthHelp: Require at least this width for the right area to split in two.
LanguageData.SettingPairGapHelp: Space between adjacent cells in a two-up layout.
LanguageData.SettingGapInsideHelp: Space between left and right text areas inside a cell.
LanguageData.SettingTwoColGapHelp: Space between the two internal columns when splitting right text.
LanguageData.SettingRowMinHeightHelp: Minimum height for a row of content.
LanguageData.SettingExtraRowSpacingHelp: Add vertical spacing after each completed row (or pair).
LanguageData.SettingMaxLeftWidthFracHelp: Upper bound for the left label width as a fraction of the inner content area.
LanguageData.SettingReduceAgeHelp: If checked, the reincarnation ritual will instead phsyically regress the pawn to that of a child. Otherwise, it will regress the pawn mentally.
LanguageData.SettingRitualAgeResultHelp: The target age a pawn will be reduced to by the rebirth ritual. Only works if 'Reduce Age' is checked as well
LanguageData.SettingNotWithForeverYoung: Will not work if 'ForeverYoung' is installed!
LanguageData.SettingExtraGrowthMomentsHelp: If off, former adults will NOT get extra growth moments at ages 7/10/13. If on, growth moments will work as normal.
LanguageData.SettingIdeologyRolesHelp: Allow former adults to hold roles in their ideology.
LanguageData.SettingLearningNeedHelp: Controls if pawns will have the need to learn after being regressed to the age of a child. Many child activity are based on this need. Without it, many childish behaviours will not happen.
LanguageData.SettingEnableBladderForRaidVisitorCarava: Activates bladder need for more and less friendly visitors. This will also made members of caravans trying to make it to a toilet in your base, similar to how they search for a table for eating.
LanguageData.SettingDynamicGeneticsHelp: Adds a random genetic bladder property to some of the NEWLY generated pawns, like small and big bladders or a tendency for bedwetting.
LanguageData.SettingAdultBedwetterChanceHelp: The rate of how many adults will keep bedwetting into adulthood. Base value is {CHANCE}%.
LanguageData.SettingBladderControlFactorHelp: Lower control causes more wetting incidents in general. Modifier is applied after everything. Base value is {CHANCE}%.
LanguageData.SettingNighttimeControlFactorHelp: Lower control causes more wetting incidents AT NIGHT. Modifier is applied after everything. Base value is {CHANCE}%.
LanguageData.SettingNeedDiapersOnBladderControlHelp: Determines when a pawn will automatically accept that they need diapers at this level of control DURING DAYTIME. Base value is {CHANCE}%.
LanguageData.SettingNeedPullupsOnBladderControlHelp: Determines when a pawn will automatically accept that they need nighttime pull-ups at this level of control DURING NIGHTTIME. Modifier applied after everything. Base value is {CHANCE}%.
LanguageData.SettingUseBedPanHelp: Enables bedpans for pawns that can't get up from bed, but still have sufficient control over their bladder.
LanguageData.SettingActivateFaecesHelp: Will activate the mention, sounds and creation of poop in the world. There are no gameplay changes beyound that.
LanguageData.SettingBladderRelieveAmountHelp: The amount that is reduced from the bladder by peeing (or pooing) every need interval (2.5 seconds) if done in a pawns pants. Toilets have seperate rules.
LanguageData.SettingUseBedPanIfDiaperEquippedHelp: Will also enable the option of bedpans for pawns that are wearing diapers. NOTE: This only works if bedpans are enabled.
LanguageData.SettingDebugModeHelp: Activates a lot of debugging logs for dev mode, in case you want to find an error. Usually no restarts/reloads are required.
LanguageData.SettingDebugClothHelp: Generates debugging related to cloth systems.
LanguageData.SettingDebugJobsHelp: Generates debugging related to pawn jobs.
LanguageData.SettingDebugCapacitiesHelp: Generates debugging related to capacities like bladder control.
LanguageData.SettingDebugGenesHelp: Generates debugging related to genes and creation of gene-related conditions and changes.
LanguageData.SettingDebugBedwettingHelp: Generates debugging related to all bedwetting functions and calls.
LanguageData.SettingDebugRegressionHelp: Generates debugging related to regression, regression-based stat and damage changes.
LanguageData.SettingDebugApparelHelp: Generates debugging related to the apparel generator used when generating new pawns.
